Title: Establishes an inmate minimum wage increase fund to receive contributions for the support of an increase in wages for incarcerated individuals
Summary: Establishes an inmate minimum wage increase fund to receive contributions for the support of an increase in wages for incarcerated individuals participating in work programs through a personal income tax return check-off; provides that for tax years after January 1, 2020, any individual may elect to contribute to such fund by indicating such intent on a tax form.
LawCode: Add ยง630-g, Tax L; add ยง97-yyyy, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to support for a minimum wage increase for inmates
